skillTree.name: Terradon
skillTree.description: Dangerous predators with sharp talons and pointed beaks, these giant flying reptiles are surprisingly agile and can spot their prey at great distances.

skillTree.name: Stegadon
skillTree.description: Mighty, horned, reptilian beasts, Stegadons are naturally armoured with bony scales and spikes protruding from their crests.

skillTree.name: Ancient Stegadon
skillTree.description: Amongst the largest and most ferocious of their race, the eldest Stegadons have thicker hide and larger horns than others of their kind.

skillTree.name: Ancient Stegadon (Engine of the Gods)
skillTree.description: Only the eldest, largest and most ferocious of their kind can move the Engines of the Gods!

effects.description: Mount: Ancient Stegadon (Engine of the Gods)

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +5%
	(all units in army)

Ambush defence chance: +10%
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: Blessing of Swiftness
skillTree.description: Sotek marks his finest servants with divine blessings.

skillTree.name: Winds of Time
skillTree.description: Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Magic Stability
skillTree.description: Only few casters are able to stabilize winds of magic.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Dynamism
skillTree.description: True understanding gives rise to a spirit of protection.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.name: Esteemed Priest
skillTree.description: Those of particular skill deciphering the will of the Slann are held in high regard amongst their kin.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Herb Collectors
skillTree.description: A crew of skinks serve the priest, collecting healing herbs and distributing them to the host.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Cornered Rat
skillTree.description: Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.

skillTree.name: Supply Lines
skillTree.description: Utilizing a complex network of skink workers, supplies for the smallest Lizardmen can be easily procured.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Reclaimed Pools
skillTree.description: As more territory returns to the Lizardmen, more spawning pools are restored.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(Lord's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Power Sap
skillTree.description: Drain the winds of magic before the enemy can turn them against us.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing
	(all units in army)

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -10% when increasing
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Experienced
skillTree.description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

skillTree.name: Calming
skillTree.description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.name: Quell
skillTree.description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Architect
skillTree.description: My lord, we can save time and supplies if we make some slight modifications to this design.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -1% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -3% for all buildings
	(local region)

Construction cost: -5% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Potent
skillTree.description: So great is this oneâ€™s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
	(own armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Scouting
skillTree.description: Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Cleanse Corruption
skillTree.description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Steal Technology
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Arrogant
backgroundSkills.description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

backgroundSkills.name: Humble
backgroundSkills.description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

backgroundSkills.name: Pompous
backgroundSkills.description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: "The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Vigorous
backgroundSkills.description: A skink that never gets tired or hungy.

backgroundSkills.name: Kroxigor Leader
backgroundSkills.description: The Lizardmen follow him and respect him.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +2 for Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -4% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
	(all units in army)

Recruit rank: +1 for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders and Coatl units
	(all units in army)

Speed: +10% for Cold One units
	(all units in army)

Missile strength: +5% for Terradon Riders units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Survivor
backgroundSkills.description: Survivor and shepard of his kind.
